metadata.Title: CVE-2022-1804 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - medium.
metadata.Description:
accountsservice no longer drops permissions when writing .pam_environment

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo ua fix CVE-2022-1804` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

accountsservice - 0.6.55-0ubuntu14.1
gir1.2-accountsservice-1.0 - 0.6.55-0ubuntu14.1
libaccountsservice0 - 0.6.55-0ubuntu14.1
No subscription required

notes.Note: mdeslaur> This is caused by the fix for CVE-2020-16126 being reverted

criterions.comment: accountsservice package in impish, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '0.6.55-0ubuntu14.1').
